problems.title: Electronics & IoT
problems.description: Create web-controlled Rover for basic movements

problems.title: AI ML
problems.description: Build an image classification model with Neural Network

problems.title: Mechatronics
problems.description: Create robotic arm for precise 3D movements, transferring a box

problems.title: Innovative Idea
problems.description: Let your innovation speak on behalf of you

criteria.about: The annual robotics hackathon is conducted by the KGEC Robotics Society. In this hackathon, there will mainly be three domains, namely, Electronics and IoT, Machine Learning, and Mechatronics and Robotics. This hackathon will contain very beginner-friendly topics so that everyone with different levels of experience can easily participate in it. However, performance will be measured in terms of the different aspects of the competition, including teamwork and coordination, quality of the solution.

rules.rule: Should be familiar with atleast one of the Domains/Techstack: mentioned above
The team members may represent different institutions
Code base and simulation or video feedback must be provided with proper description
Palgarsm will result in immediate disqualification
You can select maximum of two domains

faqs.question: I am not a student of KGEC, Can I participate?
I am a beginner can I participate?
faqs.answer: There is no such restriction but with some amount of development knowledge in any domain will be good to go.

faqs.question: Can I participate as a team?
Can 3rd year students also participate?
faqs.answer: You can participate as a mentee if you are a beginner to open source and development. If you have sound knowledge about these, then we highly encourage you to participate as a mentor or project admin.

faqs.question: Do you have any other doubt?
faqs.answer: Please feel free to contact us,
